alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:59PM CDT until August 11 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CRAWFORD AND SOUTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 958 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of West Fork to near Devils Den State Park to 3 miles northwest of Lee Creek, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Winslow... Chester... Blackburn... Lee Creek... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Lake Fort Smith... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Walnut Grove... Bidville... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 29 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
